Posts.Content: I have heard that Accolate, an asthma drug, can help decrease the chances of encapsulation. Please google this and then speak to your physician. Not being harsh, but it sounds like you might need a second opinion.
Posts.Title: Explant Surgery?

Posts.Content: Also, I see that you are in Nantucket. A very kind surgeon named Michele Gadd is at Mass General. I am having my mastectomy with her in a few weeks. She would be wiling to listen to your concerns.
Posts.Title: Explant Surgery?
